- [用 TypeScript 类型体操实现 Base64 编解码](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/525186722)
	- 为什么有 Base64 编码这种东西呢？
		- 因为有时在某些环境下，只有部分文本是可以可靠传输的，比如在终端环境中，一些控制字符有特殊的用途，可能无法显示或复制。如果想在这些环境中传递二进制数据或完整的 Latin-1 字符集，可以使用 Base64 编码
	- [Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#--yLY+LLOA3K8oQgqCJSDgIFKATyIqDMM6wjMM3yzMs167OM76XOKl68q8yqKqC76Asczz3NM5LwuS5zsts9z-O86LCus6Lyu+qrQtS3zrNc-zcu6yqWtekrrNCybxti7rmv6-z1tWzLfOmw7Ksm6Lrsq3b6tq7bRs6-bTv24bweqwbirs+HYfO9bBsSxbAfa9HLuRxbydm2nQfGyH2dh4HkfBwXutF8bRcZyrQemyHVd5-bBcG-XQuN-Hmvl5rlft-XfuBxH2t633TcDxLwe9yPCuh2Lofj-7zPhzLUeTzb0+O7PMfL53SfdwPq+Fwng8u6XCdmy7ps71bZ9bx7i8e9PFc71X9-H9n8+59frezz3H-c1-xeO4fN+jyjj-H2N9h4H0ngfceJ8IFpy-h7OBp8rYbzdmA-Oz8+Yf3Dpg522Dj4VygVXCBNdMF11fvPductW7-yoUQr2ucQGtx5j3COzC2Y905uwth0tWCB1PrwjhisuEzxHsLMeAsx5CJXhPSRncp5CPznPURRsBGbx4TbFh6j5HnyjkwmOGjHbyJTnHUucclamKUa-NR9C1Gf3AUokeNi1aOO1s4vhm9xGby4eAxxDdoECJPl4qRmdAmyLTroq+Hir5eKwYQkxSCNH4JsYQpJ2ckl1xrhgjJ-i3ZpLMa-aJoTGFsOYTw9hpTJblKcVElhY9KnaKnpU9Jc9inqMaSY4x4jjEtOfo022Fcmb9NEZAzpqj8E1KPuU5J+CmGxJGTfSZRjCEzPQQsvhNcOHrOKbYiJWzzalNDvso2hyLbHPVu3VJFCBn9N2YsgJhz4EULWRk+5fTzk1KifsmJ5yZn9M+ScqhZzHlbKvp83xALOmPNBWYxhQyYVQt9EoOmrB5CYEJuyTkUBkw8DoBAI0OphSimpnUaUM45wLhXOuTcu4DzHjPJeW8j4fx-ggABICoEIJQVgkweCiEULdl7P2QccYmwdgJkTDkJNMXYtxfiym0A5CSlQHTFmDsMEVMVvrXuNs7ae2jlqhurSl4lzLo3Luq8pa7ywaoveF975vygRag1d8kEEMAYgqhJDJH6MyXsg5c8rFuO0c7QJCSfVGNgbElJBTImvMZnU7pGycG-MSW7OZPyrlgtue0h5FDQUQs1oilQ2AlAoowGijAxNVhYpxXiokhBSRypQLMMIrhDBOA+FAD8H5q0yrrQ2ykKAu09trfWuVyYiB8BAE29t5bK3QCHdKkd-aqQBHHYQSdJwIhGEaAEXoOhN0SG3dIOQ7gi1QA7WujdiIIgxGKKUTFfIiiJGSJitUT6SgvuTJqd997kw6h-Z+-UAGRDJiNMBzFE68AgEqNUTt3bF06j7Y2gInBL1QeUJwTgt693ACKMO-FIoMgmA2JScgOwUD4YFHKpot7kyPriMmN9DHv0Mf-QxoDDGwORFsGYGDZ7RhnuCGh4416JC3ufSB+jd7P1MekyBljcnMX--XhsnFO8PU8G3ThjDO4veewCtnAwQcObZh-BwLcOIA5YlE4NHO6z2lb+0dyrmO7AOEt393HL7ms07KE4ZnXhWcIdNzl5tMvBtM4YxFibemwsUe03NhbhGlvcaS8J8VHYOxQCoEwOdZBusQBoJYfDWWqTyAzIIQgVZdC8EIIgUkYr0WSspMuvPcg2d7eoI38tQA)
